results.name: Disney Illusion Island Starring Mickey and Friends

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: At least 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 470 or above
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you're on NVIDIA 30 series or above graphics cards, you will need to run the vulkan version of this game for optimal performance.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: At least 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 470 or above
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you're on NVIDIA 30 series or above graphics cards, you will need to run the vulkan version of this game for optimal performance.
